attributes.action: Drug taking as a defence for crimes committed should not be a valid defence.
attributes.background: People should not be allowed to use Being High On Drugs or Drink as a defence. Why are they allowed to try to use a crime to validate a second crime. They should be charged for admitting they broke the law in the first instance.

rejection.details: We cannot accept your petition as it does not call for clear action from either the UK Government or Parliament.
